lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sunday's prime-time shows include a situation comedy, "Married ... with Children," which Kellner describes as an alternative to the suger coated family shows on the networks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company, built around Murdoch's two billion dlr acquisition of seven television stations last year, marks the first network startup since 1948, when ABC, now owned by Capital Cities/ABC Inc <CCB>, hit the airwaves.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But James Mandelbaum, a Los Angeles-based entertainment attorney said, "If they have enough money, they have a good chance of making it work."
